ToolCards.name: Roughing Forceps
ToolCards.description: After drafting, increase or decrease the value of the drafted die by 1. 1 may not change to 6, or 6 to 1.

ToolCards.name: Eglomise Brush
ToolCards.description: Move any one die in your window ignoring the color restrictions. You must obey all other placement restrictions.

ToolCards.name: Copper Foil Reamer
ToolCards.description: Move any one die in your window ignoring shade restrictions. You must obey all other placement restrictions.

ToolCards.name: Lathekin
ToolCards.description: Move exactly two dice, obeying all placement restrictions.

ToolCards.name: Manual Cutter
ToolCards.description: Move up to two dice of the same color that match the color of a die on the Round Track. You must obey all placement restrictions.
